meta.name: Automated Freelance Gig Finder with Bright Data & n8n

parameters.content:
=======================================
            WORKFLOW ASSISTANCE
=======================================
For any questions or support, please contact:
    Yaron@nofluff.online

Explore more tips and tutorials here:
   - YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@YaronBeen/videos
   - LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/yaronbeen/
=======================================

# ğŸš€ **Automated Daily Job Scraper Workflow**

This automation scrapes new job gigs from **We Work Remotely (WWR)** daily based on your preferred skill, extracts job information, and appends it neatly into a **Google Sheet** â€” all without lifting a finger! Letâ€™s break it down into 3 easy-to-understand sections:

---

## ğŸ”¹ **SECTION 1: Trigger + Set Your Filter**

> *Automate and personalize your job search.*

### ğŸ•’ 1. Run Scraper Daily

**Node Type**: Trigger
**Purpose**: Automatically runs the workflow every 24 hours.
**How it helps**:
No manual work needed! The automation ensures the job list is updated daily without you having to remember anything.

ğŸ”§ **Icon Tip**:
`âš¡` = Trigger
`â°` = Time-based action

---

### ğŸ–‹ï¸ 2. Set Skill Filter

**Node Type**: Manual Input / Set Node
**Purpose**: Define the specific skill (e.g., â€œPythonâ€, â€œUI/UXâ€) you want to search gigs for.
**How it helps**:
You control what kind of job gigs to track. Want only "React" jobs? Just set it once and forget.

ğŸ§  **Beginner Tip**:
Think of this as setting the topic for your daily newsletter â€” you get exactly what youâ€™re interested in.

ğŸ”§ **Icon Tip**:
`ğŸ–‹ï¸` = Skill Input or Filter Logic

---

## ğŸŒ **SECTION 2: Scraping & Extraction**

> *Fetch real job listings based on your criteria.*

### ğŸŒ 3. Scrape WWR with Bright Data

**Node Type**: HTTP Request
**Purpose**: Uses the Bright Data Web Unlocker to visit the We Work Remotely website and fetch HTML data of job postings.
**How it helps**:
By using Bright Data, you're bypassing bot detection and scraping like a pro without writing a single line of code.

ğŸ”§ **Icon Tip**:
`ğŸŒ` = API/Web scraper

ğŸ” **Beginner Tip**:
Bright Data makes sure you're not blocked while scraping websites that usually donâ€™t allow bots.

---

### ğŸ§¾ 4. Extract Jobs from HTML

**Node Type**: Code / Extraction
**Purpose**: Converts raw HTML into structured job information (like job title, company, and link).
**How it helps**:
No need to look at complicated HTML. This step cleans and formats the data into something meaningful and usable.

ğŸ”§ **Icon Tip**:
`ğŸ–¥ï¸ğŸ“„` or `</>` = HTML parser

ğŸ§  **Beginner Tip**:
This is like taking a messy newspaper and extracting only the job ads you care about.

---

## ğŸ“Š **SECTION 3: Save to Google Sheets**

> *Turn your daily gigs into a growing list you can use and filter anytime.*

### ğŸ“„ 5. Save Gigs to Google Sheets

**Node Type**: Google Sheets
**Purpose**: Appends each new gig to a Google Sheet in your Drive.
**How it helps**:
You now have a daily updating list of remote jobs â€” ready to view, sort, and apply from one place.

ğŸ“Œ **Icon Tip**:
`ğŸ“„ğŸŸ©` = Google Sheets

ğŸ§  **Beginner Tip**:
This becomes your personal remote job tracker that updates itself daily!

---

## ğŸ’¡ **How Beginners Can Take Advantage**

1. **Zero Code Needed**: All done visually in tools like n8n â€“ no programming background required.
2. **Customization Friendly**: Just change the skill filter to get different job types.
3. **Scalable**: Add more job boards or filters in future.
4. **Saves Hours**: No need to visit sites daily or manually copy job info.
5. **Great for Freelancers, Students & Job Seekers**.

---

## ğŸŒŸ Final Summary (With Emojis for Fun)

| Step | Node           | Emoji | Description                           |
| ---- | -------------- | ----- | ------------------------------------- |
| 1    | Run Daily      | â°     | Automatically starts every day        |
| 2    | Set Skill      | ğŸ–‹ï¸   | Choose what skill to search jobs for  |
| 3    | Scrape WWR     | ğŸŒ    | Uses Bright Data to grab job postings |
| 4    | Extract HTML   | ğŸ§¾    | Converts raw HTML to structured data  |
| 5    | Save to Sheets | ğŸ“Š    | Appends new jobs to a Google Sheet    |

---
